body_html:
We usually raise an exception from the TF_Status error code. It might be easier to print it in TFE_FastPathExecute though since I don't know how exceptions work across the python/R boundary.

body:
We usually raise an exception from the TF_Status error code. It might be
easier to print it in TFE_FastPathExecute though since I don't know how
exceptions work across the python/R boundary.

On Wed, Jul 11, 2018 at 12:32 PM J.J. Allaire <notifications@github.com>
wrote:
